blog.name: oxymitch
blog.title: Whatever Mitch
blog.description:
I am Mitch of Singapore, also an Ace. I enjoy reading superhero comics (especially Marvel); comic books aren't just for boys, girls read it too. However, I have no interest in any Marvel movie due to my jaded attitude, so I prefer Marvel cartoons like 90s X-Men TAS and Avengers EMH. 
Those Marvel comics I love reading are New Warriors, X-Men, Young Avengers, X-Factor, Avengers (not that Bendis era), Generation X, Avengers Academy and X-Force. 
Big fan of New Warriors and X-Men. 
My Favourite Marvel characters are...GAMBIT (Remy LeBeau), JUBILEE (Jubilation Lee), SPEEDBALL (Robbie Baldwin), WICCAN (Billy Kaplan), JUSTICE (Vance Astrovik), ROGUE (Anna Marie), SPEED (Tommy Shepherd), NIGHTCRAWLER (Kurt Wagner), FIRESTAR (Angelica Jones), QUICKSILVER (Pietro Maximoff), SHE-HULK (Jennifer Walters), QUASAR (Wendell Vaughn) and COSMO the space dog.

summary: A preview of Amazing Spider-Man v5 #19 AMAZING SPIDER-MAN #19 “HUNTED” PART 3! Something horrible happened last issue that’s...
caption:
A preview of Amazing Spider-Man v5 #19

AMAZING SPIDER-MAN #19

“HUNTED” PART 3! Something horrible happened last issue that’s galvanized all the villains! Spidey desperately needs to get out of this horrible situation, but there are lives (innocent and otherwise) at stake and…well…he’s Spider-Man.

Written by: Nick Spencer
Art by: Gerardo Sandoval
Cover by: Humberto Ramos
Page Count: 26 Pages
Release Date: April 10 2019
Age Rating: 12+ Only

I hope Black Cat and Billy Connors could get out of this madness. 

So…Iguana, Gazelle, Bison, Mad-Dog and poor Gibbon are dead. Though I am slightly thankful that Mandrill the creepy villain is dead.

blog.name: male-reads
blog.title: male & neutral reader inserts
blog.description: Requests are open! Neutral and male readers welcome. Fandoms Masterlist

title: Peter Parker: Lab
body:
Fandom: Marvel
Pairing: Peter Parker x Male!Reader
Summary: Becoming lab partners has never been so good.
Request: hi could you do one with Peter Parker x Reader where the reader goes to Peter’s school and they get paired up for a lab or something and they end up working after school together and kiss or something

Lab was fun. It was pretty fun to do - when you had a competent partner. It was a kind of relief that you ended up paired up with one Peter Parker.

Another feeling you got immediately after the relief was utter dread.

Why did you have to get paired up with Parker? The one guy that you happened to crush on. You kinda wished you were paired up with Ned, the guy was pretty cool.

Peter was one of few who had come out at the school. He identified as bi, and had yelled down Flash one time when he had bullied a kid about their sexuality. That had been a sight to see, especially when Flash actually got in trouble.

But yeah. You were stuck as Peter’s pining partner for the rest of the year.

“We don’t need to pour too much in,” you said, reading off the board. “Don’t want the damn thing to explode.”

Peter nodded and you could swear that his ears had gone a little pink.

“H-hey, um, since we’re partnered for-for the rest of the year, do you think we can meet up after school to-to figure out our experiments,”

“Yeah, sure.” you said with a nod. “Today?”

Peter nodded his head a little too enthusiastically. He spilled some acid.

The two of you ended up setting the fire alarms off about two seconds later.

“I can’t believe you spilled that much acid,” you said, smiling. “How concentrated was that?”

Peter’s cheeks flushed an adorable red. “Very.” He looked away shyly when you laughed. “We, uh, should get to work. Map out what we do,”

You nodded and pulled your chair closer to his. “Great idea, Spider-boy,”

The choking sound was mildly alarming. You reached over and patted his back in an attempt to clear his airways. “Y-yo-you know?” he asked, shocked to his core.

“Uh, yeah? It’s kinda obvious. You were absent from the Decathalon, yet Spider-Man appeared with the group when the elevator collapsed. Don’t worry, I’m not gonna tell anyone.”

You loaded up the notes on your laptop as if that was the end of a casual conversation.

It took Peter a moment to catch up and start helping with the work.

A few hours later, a sort of timetable was worked out and research was planned between the pair of you.

“You really won’t tell anyone?” Peter asked as the two of you walked through the corridors of the school, making your way out of it.

“About your bugsona? Nah,”

Peter spluttered. “It’s - it’s not a -”

You laughed. “I’m just messing with you. Really, though, I won’t tell.”

“Thanks. But maybe tell me how to be less obvious about it?” he asked. You paused in your steps and reached over and tugged at the bright red spandex poking out from his collar.

“Maybe don’t wear it underneath your regular clothes?” you suggested. Peter laughed a little, nodding his head.

“I’ll try my best.”

You both made it out the doors of the high school. It was a lot calmer now, surprisingly. Usually Queens was always full of life.

“I’ll see you tomorrow?” Peter asked. You nodded, feeling a little nervous all of a sudden.

Deciding on fuck it, you leaned over and kissed his cheek. “See you tomorrow, Spider-boy.” You made to go a separate way, but Peter caught your hand. You looked back at him. Peter looked so goddamn nervous, but it didn’t stop him to pull you close enough so he could kiss you properly.

About three hours later, he sent you a screenshot of a text conversation with Tony Stark, who was apparently eager to get to know you.

But yeah. You were stuck as Peter’s pining partner for the rest of the year.

blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales Requested by: Peter Parker Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales
Requested by: Peter Parker

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone.  Modern communication seems to have come to an end.  What remains is radiowaves.  People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on.  Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

As he tuned the radio through the various channels, looking for news, Miles heard the end of a series of coordinates.  As the static cleared, a familiar voice sounded, a voice he had not heard in over a year –

This is Peter Parker broadcasting for Miles Morales. I know you are a survivor so you are out there somewhere. This is no city, but its got video games, good people, strong walls and plenty to eat. Also hot showers are a thing here so yeah try to find your way here kid. Us spiders need to stick together.

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted
